DOC.brief_summary: The addition of heparin increases pregnancy outcome parameters in poor responders undergoing In Vitro Fertilisation (IVF)
DOC.brief_title: Role of Heparin in Poor Responders Undergoing In Vitro Fertilisation
DOC.criteria: poor responders (age>40, abnormal ovarian test, </=4 oocytes in previous cycle with conventional stimulation) infertility, indication for IVF no contraindications for heparin
